column4: if your bluetooth card is built into your wifi card, is it possible to cause lag with a bluetooth mouse?
how would I disable a built in bluetooth card and enable a usb one?
well, you can always have both enabled, but to disable it the easiest method may be via the BIOS

thank you for helping out, but please prefix your messages with the name of the user you are talking to. it *greatly* decreases confusion and most irc clients will highlight the message for the affected user
